text.home: Have more fun, enjoy more play, and get more from Discord. Supercharge your Discord server with Blip.

commands.name: welcome channel
commands.description: Changes the channel where Blip sends the welcome card once a member joins.

commands.name: leave channel
commands.description: Changes the channel where Blip sends the leave card once a member leaves.

commands.name: level enable
commands.description: Changes wether the level system for the current guild is enabled or not.

commands.name: levelup message
commands.description: Changes the message that shows when a user levels up! use {user} for user and {level} for level.

commands.name: levelup delay
commands.description: Changes the delay after which the user gets random XP added to their profile.

commands.name: lockjoin
commands.description: Locks the guilds and stops members from joining your guild further.

commands.name: ask
commands.description: Ask Blip a question! cuz Blip smort

commands.name: how gay
commands.description: Check how gay you are! (this is very accurate.)

commands.name: joke
commands.description: Grabs joke the internet and shows it to you.

commands.name: memes
commands.description: Grabs a random meme from reddit API.

commands.name: rank
commands.description: Check your xp, level on the current server!

commands.name: clyde
commands.description: Make clyde say something! Not the actual clyde.

commands.name: invert
commands.description: Invert someone's or your own Avatar

commands.name: server card
commands.description: Shows basic details of the server in a card form.

commands.name: slap
commands.description: Slap someone or get slapped by Blip!

commands.name: trigger
commands.description: Trigger someone ore yourself!

commands.name: trump
commands.description: Make trump tweet something?

commands.name: wasted
commands.description: Wasted.

commands.name: avatar
commands.description: View someone's or your own avatar.

commands.name: bot stats
commands.description: See some basic information about Blip

commands.name: commands
commands.description: This is a help menu from where you can view all the commands!

commands.name: ping
commands.description: Pong! Get Blip's latency in milli-seconds

commands.name: server info
commands.description: View basic information about the server.

commands.name: user info
commands.description: View basic information about a user or yourself.

commands.name: weather
commands.description: Get weather of a specific City!

commands.name: trump
commands.description: Make trump tweet something?

commands.name: afk
commands.description: Sets your afk and notifies the person who pings you about the reason.

commands.name: esnipe
commands.description: Shows the previous edited message in the current channel.

commands.name: snipe
commands.description: Shows the previous deleted message in the current channel.
Make Blip stay in a voice channel 24/7.

commands.name: autoplay
commands.description: Finds the best similar next song to the current one and plays it next in the queue.

commands.name: filter
commands.usage: /filter <vibrato, karoke, Tremelo, vaporwave, nightcore, party, radio, pop, bassboost, bass, treblebass, soft, off>
commands.description: Apply filters to your current playing music

commands.name: join
commands.description: Makes Blip join your current voice channel.

commands.name: leave
commands.description: Disconnects Blip from your current voice channel and clears the queue.

commands.name: loop
commands.description: Loops the current playing song/queue.

commands.name: now playing
commands.description: Shows the current playing music with extra details.

commands.name: pause
commands.description: Pauses your current playing music.

commands.name: resume
commands.description: Resumes your current paused music.

commands.name: play
commands.description: Allows you to play songs from youtube/soundcloud. (Songs played from other sources such as spotify are coverted to youtube tracks and then played.)

commands.name: queue
commands.description: Shows the current queue.

commands.name: radio
commands.description: Listen to online Radio with Blip! get a list of radio stations when typing /radio

commands.name: remove
commands.description: Remove a un wanted song from your playlist.

commands.name: seek
commands.description: Make Blip stay in a voice channel 24/7

commands.name: shuffle
commands.description: Shuffles the queue.

commands.name: skip
commands.description: Skips the current playing music.

commands.name: volume
commands.description: Changes the volume of music player.
